    +Self:SELF.parent_object:OBJECT

Public

    -Self:SELF.create:SELF
        Create the SDL_Surface structure

Public

    -Self:SELF.create_with :POINTER :SELF

Public

    -Self:SELF.make :POINTER
        LOAD images:

Public

    -Self:SELF.load_bmp :STRING_CONSTANT
        Load a BMP file with path+name (ie. /data/image.bmp).

Public

    -Self:SELF.load :STRING_CONSTANT
        Load an image.

Public

    -Self:SELF.value:POINTER
        Don't use it unless you know what you are doing

Public

    -Self:SELF.is_null:BOOLEAN
        Return if no image loaded

Public

    -Self:SELF.is_not_null:BOOLEAN
        Return if no image loaded

Public

    -Self:SELF.w:INTEGER
        Surface width. (READ ONLY)

Public

    -Self:SELF.h:INTEGER
        Surface height (READ_ONLY)
